create.priceTable: CREATE TABLE prices (date DATE, tickerID INT REFERENCES tickers(tickerID), price DECIMAL);
create.tickerTable: CREATE TABLE tickers (tickerID SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, ticker VARCHAR(6), description TEXT);
create.statTable: CREATE TABLE stats (date DATE, codeID INT REFERENCES codes(codeID), stat DECIMAL);
create.codeTable: CREATE TABLE codes (codeID SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, category VARCHAR(20), description TEXT);

insert.priceTable: INSERT INTO prices (date, tickerID, price) VALUE ($1, $2, $3) RETURNING tickerID, date;
insert.tickerTable: INSERT INTO tickers (ticker, description) VALUES ($1, $2) RETURNING tickerID;

select.tickerID: SELECT tickerID FROM tickers WHERE ticker = $1;
select.tickerInfo: SELECT tickerID, desc FROM tickers WHERE ticker = $1;
select.tickerPrice: SELECT date, price FROM prices WHERE tickerID = $1;
